title: Disqualified
logline: A ruthless coach drives exhausted athletes toward perfection while two silent officials record every move-until a triumphant "pass" becomes a sudden doping disqualification, and reality snaps to an MRI room where contrast has revealed a tumor in time.
theme: What looks like punishment can be protection; harsh systems can expose hidden danger and save a life.

lines.text: At the pool, the Synchronized Swimmer holds a flawless smile and pose, but her shoulders tremble from fatigue.
Again. From the top.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: The swimmer dives and resurfaces gasping, forcing her face back into a bright, competition-ready smile.
Two suited officials stand near the lane, writing in tablets without reacting to anyone's pain.
Does not pass.
lines.speaker: Tech 1

lines.text: You don't fall apart. You hold.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: In the corridor, multiple athlete groups sit on the floor catching breath while the coach strides past like a storm.
On your feet. The championship doesn't wait.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: Above them on a stair landing, the two officials watch in silence and continue logging numbers and notes.
In the cheer gym, a line of athletes locks a stunt; one athlete's leg shakes and the formation wobbles.
Stop. I can see weakness.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: They attempt it again; the same shake returns, and the moment collapses in front of the coach's stare.
Does not pass.
lines.speaker: Tech 2

lines.text: In the dance studio, a polished line executes turns; one dancer slips a fraction, then forces a recovery.
No mistakes. From the top.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: They repeat; the tiny slip flashes again, and the officials' pens move like a verdict being written.
Does not pass.
lines.speaker: Tech 1

lines.text: In a small training room, a young Gymnast practices; a barely noticeable wrap peeks from under her sleeve.
You. Now. Show me.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: The Gymnast performs cleanly-perfect landing, perfect stillness-and the room erupts in relieved cheers.
Recorded. Passed.
lines.speaker: Tech 2

lines.text: The coach allows herself a brief smile-then freezes as the officials step forward with ceremonial calm.
Disqualified. Doping control: positive.
lines.speaker: Tech 1

lines.text: That's absurd. They only worked.
lines.speaker: Coach Gadolinium

lines.text: Tech 2 taps the tablet; a red indicator light snaps on, and the room falls into stunned silence.
Smash cut: the Patient opens their eyes inside an MRI room, breathing hard as if waking from a vivid dream.
Take your time. You can sit up slowly.
lines.speaker: Doctor

lines.text: The Doctor points to the scan image where one area is clearly highlighted compared to surrounding tissue.
Good thing you did the MRI with contrast early. It helped us spot a tumor.
lines.speaker: Doctor

lines.text: The Patient swallows, then nods-fear softening into relief at the words "early" and "spot."
